post:

**2GB KVM - Chicago, IL**

* /64 IPv6 On Request  
* 2x vCPU  
* 100GB HDD  
* 1TB Bandwidth  
* $5/month -  [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=60)


**4GB OpenVZ - Chicago, IL**  
* 1 IPv4  
* /64 IPv6 On Request  
* 2x vCPU  
* 100GB HDD  
* 1TB Bandwidth  
* $5/month - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=50)
